title: How Many Calories Are in a Whopper?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in whopper from Burger King, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for your meal planning.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Whopper?
assumptions: Standard Burger King Whopper: flame-grilled beef patty, sesame seed bun, lettuce, tomato, pickles, onions, mayonnaise, ketchup; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, customizations, and exact ingredients. Check Burger King app or packaging for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A standard Whopper contains about 657 calories with 28 g protein and 40 g fat.

label_note: Values mirror standard Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a Whopper?
What's the protein in a Whopper?
faqs.a: About 28 g of protein per Whopper.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in a Whopper?
faqs.a: Yes, 51 g total carbs, including 2 g fiber and 11 g sugars.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Whopper?
Does a Whopper have trans fat?
faqs.a: About 1.5 g of trans fat per Whopper from the beef and bun.
